location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 10: Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to His Excellency Colonel Justin Sheil CB, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, Tehran

mods.abstract: This letter concerns the right of a man named Mr Malcolm to complete the building of his house in Bushire, which had been unjustifiably denied by the Dureya Beggee [Governor of Bushire]. Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, informs Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia, that in this case he has not found it necessary to make use of the orders from the Persian Prime Minister.
